title: Stuck in Champ Select
body:
Was in a game this morning and at the end the of Champ select, we were all just stuck there able to message each other, and when one left we thought it would dodge for everyone but it didn't so I left the queue and exited my client and it keep asking me to reconnect except nothing happens when I press the reconnect button.... lol quality

UPDATE: I tried to reconnect again and now I'm in a 3v2 game...

UPDATE #2: Ended up being a 3v4 game resulting in a defeat ( I stayed in base and memed with the enemy team lel) and I lost 7lp

replies.body: Its a good thing riot never checks these boards aye?

Protip: the boards aren't the recommended way of communicating issues to Rito. If you encounter a bug then you're better off sending a ticket to support. Or at the very least, post it on the Report a Bug board seen on the sidebar.
Same stuff here, been stuck like this for 10 minutes
rito plz
yep , ghost game's as well, time to do your house chores boys its gonna be a long one.
stuck as well, ugh
Is this only for ranked or normals too?:/
same thing happened to me, and not one of my team could connect, but the whole enemy team did

also lost LP, I submitted a ticket hopefully this gets sorted out, If something unfair like this sticks I'd be unlikely to ever spend any more $ on this game.

EDIT- lost a league too.
Same problem here stuck on reconnect screen {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Update: I am now in load screen with only 3 other people, i guess they all got fed up and left. OH it just closed down and returned me to launch screen. (probably my fault as i opened another instance of league, the last one i tried to reconnect on was probably still running in the background) Took long enough.
Problem has been Fixed now!
cant even open league anymore
ok i think riot are doing lunar reval update
im in game

OMG its fixed
edit 1: but no one is on everyone left...
rofl jesus those were some quick repsonses
EVERYONE ITS WORKING NOW SO U CAN RECONECT
omg this is annoying
Everyone is getting it.
I had that too its happening to us now
Dang. Same.
Tried quitting and reconnecting but isnt working out for me
Yeah this happened to me too just now, guy said he had it before and there was nothing we could do so everyone left.
